_sText:
This is the new version of mg_scari_multigame ... And REALLY REALLY BETTER !!

This is a multigame "all in one" map with a beautiful spawn and 12 funny games.



NEW - A grenade war in a jail

NEW - A very good and diversified "Simon Says"

NEW - A deathrun direct from the spawn

NEW - An AWP minimap

- A race in an office with many traps

- A battle in a big fan (as a trampoline)

- A knife ring

- A knife battle in a big maze (with one gun in the middle of the maze and mines)

- A shotguns battle in the total dark

- A climb level (1'30 min to climb or autogive knives)

- A M-249 battle in a winter area

- A knife battle in a radioactive dock


What news in this version ? Not only 4 new games !

- NEW SPAWN REALLY REALLY BETTER AND BEAUTIFUL

- A GOOD LIGHTING IN ALL THE MINIGAMES

- 4 NEW GAMES

- BUGS FIXED

- ALL OLD GAMES ARE IMPROVED / ALL BUGS FIXED AND REALLY BETTER BACKGROUND / LIGHTING !!




This map looks like mg_scari_multigame_v2, but ... She's a thousand times better and more beautiful, believe me !



Try it, play it, enjoy it ... I promise you will not regret it =)


24 Mb Only !
